short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Control website access with Website Whitelist. Manage allowed sites to boost productivity. Simple and easy.

short.fr: Contrôlez l'accès aux sites web avec Website Whitelist. Gérez les sites autorisés pour améliorer la productivité. Simple et facile.
short.it: Controlla l'accesso ai siti web con Website Whitelist. Gestisci i siti autorizzati per aumentare la produttività. Semplice e facile.
short.ru: Контролируйте доступ к сайтам с помощью Website Whitelist. Управляйте своей продуктивностью. Решение ваших проблем в 2 клика.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Websites Whitelist - Your Personal Online Browsing Guardian.

Take full control of your online browsing with Websites Whitelist, the ultimate Chrome extension designed to help you manage and restrict which websites can be accessed. Whether you're looking to boost productivity, protect your family, or create a safer browsing environment, Websites Whitelist makes it easy to define and enforce your browsing rules.

Key Features:
📝 Whitelist Management: Add or remove websites from your whitelist with ease, ensuring only trusted sites are accessible.
🔒 Customizable Restrictions: Enable or disable the whitelist as needed, giving you full control over your browsing experience.
🚫 Real-Time Blocking: Instantly block non-whitelisted websites and redirect users to a customizable landing page.
👤 User-Driven Controls: Manage your own allowed websites list; no external changes can be made.
🖥️ Seamless UX: Enjoy a user-friendly interface designed with React dev tools for a smooth experience.

Why Choose Websites Whitelist?
⏳ Boost Your Productivity: Stay focused by blocking distracting websites and allowing only essential ones.
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Parental Control: Create a safe browsing space for children, blocking inappropriate or dangerous sites.
🔐 Prevent Unauthorized Access: Secure your device by ensuring only the websites you trust are accessible.
🛡️ Privacy Protection: Restrict unwanted sites that track your data or compromise your online privacy.
⚙️ Easy to Use: Manage your whitelist in just a few clicks, with an intuitive and minimal design.
🔄 Flexible & Customizable: Adjust settings in real-time based on your needs, making it perfect for both work and leisure.
⚡ Lightweight & Efficient: No lag or performance issues while browsing.
❌ Comprehensive Website Management: No more unintentional visits to harmful or time-wasting sites.
🎨 Minimalist Design: Enjoy an aesthetically pleasing, distraction-free interface.
👏 Empowerment for Users: You decide what content you interact with, ensuring an optimized and personalized browsing experience.
Who Should Use Websites Whitelist?
🎓 Students looking to stay focused on studying.
👶 Parents wanting to control their children's internet exposure.
💼 Professionals aiming for a distraction-free work environment.
🕵️‍♂️ Privacy-conscious users seeking to avoid invasive or harmful websites.

Take control of your online browsing experience today. Download Websites Whitelist now from the Chrome Web Store and enjoy safer, more focused internet usage!
